attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having just read about new laws to effect "errent Fathers" and to have "Fathers only" Parents evenings,  how will this will effect the 20% of lone parent families who are headed by the Father with "errent mothers"  (Office of national statistics)

Education Secretary Alan Johnson has been reported a saying "Our family policy must be bias free."

however at the same time he also said "Fathers should engage more with their children by attending special events at schools"", when he outlined the government's new parenting strategy.  seems theres a bia's here already
